item.title: Schedule
item.description: This is a tentative schedule and will change. Grading details # Assessment Type Weightage Additional Information In-class Quizzes 20% Exams (3 exams) 50% Programming Assignments 20% One late submission allowed. 50% deducted for other late submissions.
